name: Mixed Up
description:
Have you ever tried competitive farming? With Mixed Up, you can now try out your farming skills with your friends and see who has the greenest thumb. You are able to compete with them to see who can earn the most money, but you are also able to play with them and try to make complex recipes together. There are many crops to be planted, recipes to be made, and items to be sold. Happy farming!

Gameplay Controls + Instructions:
See https://imgur.com/a/F3adkk2.
